name: SPEEDWAVE777 Chapter 4
description: SPEEDWAVE777 is an arcade styled beat em up/shoot em up inspired from games like Earthbound, Streets of Rage 2, The Warriors, Super Smash Bros Melee, Sonic Adventure and various other games. Shoot and brawl your way through several stages and keep and eye out for your friends. The game takes inspiration from Music Genres from Retrowave, Synthwave, Vaporwave, Future Funk and 80s Rock.
